titleStmt.title: A standing lottery of his own books design'd to be erected by the author, John Ogilby Esq., who hath in several years last past, printed and published at his own charge, several volumes of great value and beauty ...
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.

notesStmt.note: A lottery of books previously written & published by Ogilby conducted to raise funds for the publication of his editions of Homer's Odyssey & Aesop's Fables.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
